channel.title: CVE Feed for getgrav -- getgrav/grav
channel.description: The latest CVEs for getgrav -- getgrav/grav

item.title: CVE-2021-3904|2024-08-03T17:09:09.612Z -- getgrav -- getgrav%2Fgrav
item.description: grav is vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

item.title: CVE-2021-3818|2024-08-03T17:09:09.606Z -- getgrav -- getgrav%2Fgrav
item.description: grav is vulnerable to Reliance on Cookies without Validation and Integrity Checking

item.title: CVE-2021-3924|2024-08-03T17:09:09.660Z -- getgrav -- getgrav%2Fgrav
item.description: grav is vulnerable to Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')

item.title: CVE-2022-2073|2024-08-03T00:24:44.267Z -- getgrav -- getgrav%2Fgrav
item.description: Code Injection in GitHub repository getgrav/grav prior to 1.7.34.
